{{Infobox song <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Songs --> | Name = Your Pussy's Glued to a Building on Fire | Cover = | Artist = [[John Frusciante]] | Album = [[Niandra Lades and Usually Just a T-Shirt]] | Released = March 8, 1994 | track_no = 10 | Recorded = 1991 | Genre = [[Experimental rock]], [[psychedelic rock]] | Length = 3:17 | Label = [[American Recordings (US)|American]] | Writer = [[John Frusciante]] | Producer = [[John Frusciante]] | Chart position = <!-- none --> | prev = "Skin Blues" | prev_no = 9 | next = "Blood on my Neck from Succes" | next_no = 11 }} '''"Your Pussy's Glued to a Building on Fire"''' is a [[1994]] song by [[John Frusciante]].
Frusciante had joined the [[Red Hot Chili Peppers]] in 1988. He wrote and recorded the song during the writing of the band's 1991 album ''[[Blood Sugar Sex Magik]]'' and left the band in [[1992]]. In [[1994]] he released his solo album ''[[Niandra Lades and Usually Just a T-Shirt]]''. However, most of the songs on the album, like "Your Pussy's Glued to a Building on Fire", were recorded before he left the band.
It's an [[experimental rock]] song including various elements of [[psychedelic rock]], like a [[backmasking|reversed]] guitar solo.
Frusciante performed this song live various times during the [[Red Hot Chili Peppers]]' ''[[Californication tour]]'' and ''[[Stadium Arcadium tour]]'' and at his 2001 solo tour following the ''[[To Record Only Water for Ten Days]]'' album. [[Category:John Frusciante songs]]
